name: advanced-nodejs
description: - `node -p process.versions.v8` - `node --harmony -p "'Node'.padEnd(8, '*')"` - `node --v8-options | grep "in progress"` - `node --v8-options | grep "gc"` - `node --trace_gc <js file>` - `node --expose-gc -i "gc()"` - `node --v8-options | less` - `node --harmony_trailing_commas -p "function tc(a,b,) {}"` - `node --use_strict <js file>` - `NODE_NO_READLINE=1 rlwrap node` - REPL `.help`
